privacy_policy_message: At Blood Plus, we are committed to protecting your privacy. We collect personal information such as your name, email, phone number, and donation history to provide the best service. Your data is encrypted and only shared with authorized medical organizations when necessary. You can request data deletion at any time. For more details, please contact us at support@bloodplus.com.
logout_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to logout?
logout_success_message: You have successfully logged out of the app.
login_welcome_message: Login to enjoy the features we’ve provided, and stay healthy!
account_created_successfully: Your account has been created successfully!
select_reset_method: Select a method to reset your password.
please_enter_email_or_phone: Please enter your email or phone number.
please_enter_valid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number.
enter_code_sent_to: Enter code that we have sent to your {contact}
create_password_to_login: Create your new password to login
password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
password_reset_success_message: Your password has been reset successfully!
app_info_message: Blood Plus is a blood donation app that connects donors with medical centers. Current version: 1.0.0. We are committed to providing the best experience to encourage blood donation and support the community.
support_message: Contact us for assistance with blood donation or using the Blood Plus app. We are always ready to help!
before_donation_subtitle: Prepare well to ensure a safe and effective donation process.
eat_before_donation_subtitle: A balanced diet helps you get ready for blood donation.
after_donation_subtitle: Take care of yourself to recover quickly after donating.
tip_hydrate_desc: Drink at least 500ml of water before donating to maintain blood pressure and avoid dizziness.
tip_sleep_desc: Rest for 7-8 hours the night before donating to ensure your body is in top condition.
tip_eat_iron_desc: Include foods like red meat, leafy greens, or cereals to boost hemoglobin levels.
tip_rest_desc: Avoid strenuous activities for 24 hours and rest adequately to recover.
who_can_donate_desc: Individuals aged 18-60, weighing over 45kg, free from infectious diseases, not using drugs, and without serious conditions like heart disease or diabetes. Women must not be pregnant or breastfeeding.
donation_process: What Happens During the Donation Process?
donation_process_desc:
1. Register and complete a health questionnaire.
2. Undergo a health check (blood pressure, hemoglobin).
3. Donate blood (about 5-10 minutes).
4. Rest and have a snack afterward.
how_often_donate: How Often Can I Donate Blood?
how_often_donate_desc: Men can donate every 3 months, women every 4 months, provided they are in good health.
donation_risks: Are There Any Risks in Donating Blood?
donation_risks_desc: Donating blood is safe if you’re healthy. Some may feel lightheaded or tired, but recovery is quick with rest and hydration.
who_can_donate_subtitle: Learn about the eligibility criteria for blood donation.
donation_process_subtitle: Understand the steps involved in donating blood.
how_often_donate_subtitle: Know how frequently you can donate blood.
donation_risks_subtitle: Learn about potential risks and how to mitigate them.
donation_day_count_message: You will be eligible to donate blood in {days} day(s). Stay healthy and get ready to make a difference!
donation_today_message: You are eligible to donate blood today! Visit the nearest donation center and save lives.
